title: ‘It’s time to move’: Federal judge eager to challenge NSA bulk snooping again
content:
russia today - 9/3/2015 11:24:15 PM - GMT (+4 )    A federal judge who called NSA’s surveillance practices “almost Orwellian,” says that he found a way to revive a constitutional challenge to the controversial program after a federal court lifted his 2013 injunction blocking the program. 
Read Full Article at RT.com 
read more
